definition.name: Azure PowerShell Action
definition.description: Automate your GitHub workflows using Azure PowerShell scripts.
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: inlineScript
inputs.description: Specify the Az PowerShell script here.

inputs.name: azPSVersion
inputs.description: Azure PS version to be used to execute the script, example: 1.8.0, 2.8.0, 3.4.0. To use the latest version, specify "latest".

inputs.name: errorActionPreference
inputs.description: Select the value of the ErrorActionPreference variable for executing the script. Options: stop, continue, silentlyContinue. Default is Stop.

inputs.name: failOnStandardError
inputs.description: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the error pipeline, or if any data is written to the Standard Error stream.

inputs.name: githubToken
inputs.description: Used to pull Az module from Azure/az-ps-module-versions.  Since there's a default, this is typically not supplied by the user.
